Sentencas: This paper presents a multi-scale model of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack consisting of five anode-supported cells.
Titulo: A validated multi-scale model of a SOFC stack at elevated pressure

Sentencas: A two-dimensional isothermal elementary kinetic model is used to calculate the performance of single cells.
Titulo: A validated multi-scale model of a SOFC stack at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Several of these models are thermally coupled to form the stack model.
Titulo: A validated multi-scale model of a SOFC stack at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Simulations can be carried out at steady-state as well as dynamic operation.
Titulo: A validated multi-scale model of a SOFC stack at elevated pressure

Sentencas: The model is validated over a wide range of operating conditions including variation of temperature, gas composition (both on anode and cathode side), and pressure.
Titulo: A validated multi-scale model of a SOFC stack at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Validation is carried out using polarization curves and impedance spectra.
Titulo: A validated multi-scale model of a SOFC stack at elevated pressure

Sentencas: The model is then used to explain the pressure-induced performance increase measured at constant fuel utilization of 40%.
Titulo: A validated multi-scale model of a SOFC stack at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Results show that activation and concentration overpotentials are reduced with increasing pressure.
Titulo: A validated multi-scale model of a SOFC stack at elevated pressure
